tasks.detail: Run unit and integration tests and generate an HTML coverage report
tasks.command: docker-compose -f docker-compose-test.yml up -d && ${workspaceFolder}/.venv/bin/python -m coverage run -m pytest --maxfail=5 --disable-warnings --junitxml=coverage-tests-report.xml 2>/dev/null && ${workspaceFolder}/.venv/bin/python -m coverage html -d htmlcov && docker-compose -f docker-compose-test.yml down
